coupons.description: Excludes gift card purchases, up to a maximum discount of $20
coupons.terms: Offer valid for one time usage on regular, sale and promotional merchandise at any Garage or Dynamite store in Canada or the USA, on the in-store e-comm tablet or on Garage.ca or Dynamiteclothing.com or on the Garage or Dynamite app. No minimum spend required. One coupon per customer per transaction.  This offer is not transferable. Customer must present digital coupon and loyalty I.D. to benefit from this offer in-store. Photocopies or facsimiles will not be accepted. The coupon is not redeemable for cash and cannot be combined with any other coupon or offer, including any other loyalty offer, online exclusive promotion, any mall offer, marketing offer or employee or family discount. Cannot be used on previous purchases or towards the purchase of gift cards, e-gift cards, the sale of charitable merchandise or donations. Garage/Dynamite is not responsible for lost or stolen coupons.
coupons.name: 20% off one purchase LOY1LOL

coupons.name: 25% off one purchase LOY1LOL

coupons.description: Offer is valid from March 8 to March 11, 2018. Show offer in store or apply it at checkout online or in the app!
coupons.terms: Offer is redeemable on a Garage purchase of regular price merchandise at any Garage store in Canada or the USA, on the in-store e-comm tablet, on garageclothing.com or the Garage Studio app. IN-STORE ONLY: Offer cannot be combined with sale merchandise; can be combined with certain promotional merchandise. ONLINE ONLY: Offer cannot be combined with sale merchandise or promotional merchandise. Offer is valid from March 8, 2018 at 7:00 a.m. (ET) until March 11, 2018 at 11:59 P.M. (ET). Offer is valid for one time usage. This offer is not transferable. Customer must present digital coupon and loyalty I.D. to benefit from this offer in-store. Photocopies or facsimiles will not be accepted. The coupon is not redeemable for cash and cannot be combined with any other coupon or offer, including any other loyalty offer, online exclusive promotion, any mall offer, marketing offer or employee or family discount. Cannot be used on previous purchases or towards the purchase of gift cards, e-gift cards, or the sale of charitable merchandise or donations. Garage/Dynamite is not responsible for lost or stolen coupons. Offer subject to change as Garage reserves the right to modify or cancel this promotion without notice.
coupons.name: 3 DAYS ONLY: Get 25% OFF at Garage in-store, online or in the app, in Canada or the USA.
